title: OpenSUSE Seeks Leap Replacement: Which Distro Will Rise to the Challenge?
description:
With SUSE transitioning from its traditional enterprise distribution to its ALP container approach, openSUSE Leap’s stable base is set to disappear. Now what?

The post OpenSUSE Seeks Leap Replacement: Which Distro Will Rise to the Challenge? appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Coding in Rust? RustRover Is a New IDE by JetBrains
description:
RustRover aims to be a feature-packed stand-alone Rust IDE set to receive regular updates, quick support, and an “out-of-the-box experience.”

The post Coding in Rust? RustRover Is a New IDE by JetBrains appeared first on Linux Today.
